sentences.english: The Round Table broke up following the death of Arthur.
sentences.chinese: 亚瑟死后，圆桌骑士各奔东西。

sentences.english: Graduation this day, but also all the beginning of each rush thing.
sentences.chinese: 毕业的这一天，也是大家各奔东西的开端。

sentences.english: Friend just short of excited to meet, then calm each rush thing.
sentences.chinese: 朋友只是短暂激动的相逢，而后平静的各奔东西。

sentences.english: Everyone is going to drift apart. but I don't know where I belong…
sentences.chinese: 大家即将各奔东西，而我依然不知道自己归于何处。

sentences.english: In may June finalizing every rushthing.
sentences.chinese: 五月，曲终人散，六月，各奔东西。

sentences.english: And the dear friends have to part.
sentences.chinese: 亲爱的朋友只得各奔东西。

sentences.english: Once we performing, now we each rush thing.
sentences.chinese: 曾经我们不离不弃，如今我们各奔东西。

sentences.english: After graduation my classmates drifted apart.
sentences.chinese: 毕业后我们班的同学就各奔东西了。

sentences.english: That time has become today's Gebendongxi never abandon.
sentences.chinese: 彼时的不离不弃，已变成今日的各奔东西。

sentences.english: Or we each go straight towards the things.
With the approaching of graduation all the members became respectively and the society had to be dismissed.
sentences.chinese: 初中毕业后大家各奔东西，哈社也就这样解散了。

sentences.english: Shaolin Temple since the fire, the South Shaolin sent five old has parted.
sentences.chinese: 自从火烧少林寺后，南少林派五老亦各奔东西。
